quotes.message: A fair exchange is no robbery.
quotes.name: Scottish Proverb

quotes.message: A friend's eye is a good mirror.
quotes.name: Gaelic

quotes.message: A loan though old is not a gift.
quotes.name: Hungarian

quotes.message: A man who never made a mistake, never made anything.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Avoid dishonest gain: no price can recompence the pangs of vice.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Caesar's wife must be above suspicion.
quotes.name: Julius Caesar

quotes.message: Dally not with other folk's spouses or money.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Don't pretend to be something you aren't.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don't take any wooden nickels.
quotes.name: American

quotes.message: Following the path of least resistence is what makes both men and rivers crooked.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: From the fullness of the heart, the mouth speaks.
quotes.name: Jesus Christ

quotes.message: Half the truth is often a whole lie.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: He that first cries out 'stop thief' is often he that has stolen the treasure.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: He that steals an egg will steal an ox.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Honesty is the best policy.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is better to suffer for truth than to prosper by falsehood.
quotes.name: Danish

quotes.message: Keep conscience clear, then never fear.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Keep thy shop and thy shop will keep thee.
quotes.name: George Chapman

quotes.message: Let's get things straight.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Making money selling manure is better than losing money selling musk.
quotes.name: Egyptian

quotes.message: No legacy is as rich as honesty.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Pay what you owe and what you're worth you'll know.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Possession is nine tenths of the law.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The best thing about telling the truth is...
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The contented person can never be ruined.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: The sting of a reproach is the truth of it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When a thief kisses you, count your teeth.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: You can fool people some of the time, but you can't fool them all of the time.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: If you have integrity nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity nothing else matters.
quotes.name: Alan K. Simpson

quotes.message: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: An honest man's the noblest work of God.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousand fold.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: One of the hardest things in this world is to admit you are wrong. And nothing is more helpful in resolving a situation than its frank admission.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Honesty is such a lonely word. Everyone is so untrue.
quotes.name: Billy Joel

quotes.message: Honest hearts produce honest actions.
quotes.name: Brigham Young

quotes.message: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Most of our faults are more pardonable than the means we use to conceal them.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Be true to your work your word and your friend.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: He that loseth his honesty hath nothing else to lose.
quotes.name: John Lyly

quotes.message: The true measure of life is not length, but honesty.
quotes.name: John Lyly

quotes.message: Honesty is the rarest wealth anyone can possess.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Honesty pays, but it doesn't seem to pay enough to suit some people.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: Truth, like gold is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If it is not right do not do it if it is not true do not say it.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Where is there dignity unless there is honesty?
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Honesty is the best policy when there is money in it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: One of the most striking differences between a cat and a lie is that a cat has only nine lives.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: Truth allows you to live with integrity. Everything you do and say shows the world who you really are. Let it be the Truth.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Honesty does not always bring a response of love, but it is absolutely essential to it.
quotes.name: Ray Blanton

quotes.message: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist.
quotes.name: Salman Rushdie

quotes.message: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Rather fail with honor than succeed by fraud.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Science adjusts its views based on what's observed Faith is the denial of observation so that belief can be preserved.
quotes.name: Tim Minchin

quotes.message: A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty character integrity faith love and loyalty.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar
